candidates.title: rust testcontainer framework
Add MSRV computed with `cargo msrv`
candidates.body: Bump toolchain version in CI to 1.81

candidates.title: Moved hyper support in a separate module.
candidates.body: One can now use the hyper support without necessarily using our server, nor tokio net.

candidates.title: All integration tests now pass!
candidates.body:
Except await timeout, which needs support from the shared core.

Fix error handling, now it correctly propagates errors.
Add random + headers in context.

Fix #2
